Messages: 22 is the number of stars in the Paramount Films logo.
22 is the typical (minimum) number of episodes in a season for a television program broadcast on a major American network.
22 is the number of yards in a chain.
22 is the number of chapters of the Revelation of John in the Bible.
22 is the number of players on the field in a football (soccer) match.
22 is the number of letters in the Hebrew alphabet.
